activities:
Fulfill consumer requests, assist in quickly finding and/or receiving information about eMeter Energy Engage or EnergyIP, alert consumers to updated information and services, improve the content of our Web site, and answer consumer questions. 
This information is shared only with our partners in the Program, [Customer Partners].  We do not share this information with other outside parties without permission. 

We use non-identifying and aggregate information about site visitors to measure the number of visitors to the different sections of our site, and to help make our site more useful to visitors. 
We use return email addresses to answer the email we receive. Such addresses are not shared with outside parties without permission. 
Finally, we never use or share the personally identifiable information provided to us online in ways unrelated to the ones described above without also providing you an opportunity to opt-out or otherwise prohibit such unrelated uses.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
